dict.string:
# If TM_LATEX_MASTER is not set use TM_FILEPATH : ${TM_LATEX_MASTER:=$TM_FILEPATH}
# Switch to the right directory cd "${TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY:-$TM_DIRECTORY}" cd "$(dirname "$TM_LATEX_MASTER")"
FILE="$TM_LATEX_MASTER" SCRIPT="$(find_app TeXniscope.app)/Contents/Resources/forward-search.sh"
if [[ -x "$SCRIPT" ]]; then "$SCRIPT" &>/dev/console "$TM_LINE_NUMBER" "$TM_FILEPATH" "${FILE%.tex}.pdf" open -a TeXniscope.app else echo "Unable to locate TeXniscope." fi
